mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_occurrences(sentence, words):
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    sentence_words = sentence.split()
    word_counts = Counter(sentence_words)
    results = {word.lower(): word_counts.get(word.lower(), 0) for word in words}
    return results

import re
from collections import Counter

def count_occurrences(sentence, words):
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    sentence_words = sentence.split()
    word_counts = Counter(sentence_words)
    results = {word.lower(): word_counts.get(word.lower(), 0) for word in words}
    return results

mutants.original_line: results = {word.lower(): word_counts.get(word.lower(), 0) for word in words}
mutants.mutated_line: results = {word.lower(): word_counts.get(word.lower(), 1) for word in words}

mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def count_occurrences(sentence, words):
    sentence = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', sentence)
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    sentence_words = sentence.split()
    word_counts = Counter(sentence_words)
    results = {word.lower(): word_counts.get(word.lower(), 1) for word in words}
    return results
